reason.title: 🥰 WHY FRONTEND Developer?? 👨🏻‍💻
reason.desc:
I was fascinated on software develop because developing process doesn't end up with data anaylsis, but also create my own product. I studied JavaScript to make web application and due to trend variation, I saw a lot of parts of dev parts converted to frontend. I choose frontend because I can see my code's changes result directly. Eventually, I work as frontend developer. I use
react in team project. I prioritize collaboration and try to challenge ourselves from various perspectives before waiting to solve problems. I feel proud when my team members use the code or results I wrote and then give feedback. So, we used swagger so that our team members could test the API right within the development environment. In workspace, I have used TypeScript, next, sveltekit.

about.record: Not only study, but also digest!!🧽 One practice is better than hundreds of study. I record after practice programming lauguages, libraries and frameworks to reuse after. I will write carefully so someone who enter my blog can study easier.
